body: This gauntlet, made from layers of thick leather, is worn on a falconer's off hand to give a falcon a place to stand before and after the hunt. The gauntlet also has a tassel and a ring to attach to a falcon's tether.
name: Falconry Gauntlet
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Gear/Animals/Mounts/and Related Gear/Animals/Mounts/and Related Gear/Falconry Gauntlet
